Text: Eletrobolt QApst Louise Attached is the QA for Eletrobolt It is still a work in progress so I will update it with the final version when it is ready Ranabir

Eletrobolt OPIC Press Release Cc Joe We have got the OPIC board approval for a mm project finance loan to Eletrobolt Attached is a press release that OPIC would like to release related to the project Ours in one of three projects This press release has been reviewed by the PR group Keith Miceli OPIC expects to release it later today or tomorrow Ranabir

Draft note to the lendersis a draft of a letter that we would like to send to Barclays laying out the itemsrequests associated with Conversion Gerald could you take a look at the descriptions associated with the Amendments to the Gas Gathering Agreements and the Admin Services Agmt and make corrections if necessary Audrey Could you please provide a short summary of the construction status one to two paragraphs Dean if I have missed out on anything please include them Katie Could you create Attachment A as described in the letter Thanks Ranabir
Re Lost Creek Conversionit looks good Gerald CT AM To Ranabir nron cc Subject Lost Creek Conversion Ranabir Attached is the letter with my revisions Let me know if you have any questions

Condor and sale of PowderWind Cc As you know we are in the process of selling the Powder and Wind River Assets To consumate the transaction with NB we are going to Powder River Sell PRB LLCs B ownership interest in ECTPR LLC Sell PRZ LLCs A ownership interest in ECTPR LLC Since Condor owns of B Shares in PRB I would presume that PRB can go ahead and sell the shares subject to the right price as long as it gets Condors consent ie Condor will not be a signatory to the Purchase and Sale Agreement with NB PRB would also have to get consent from ENA who is the other owner of PRB LLC but that is no problem Wind River Sell WRB LLCs B ownership interest in ECTWR LLC Sell WRZ LLCs A ownership interest in ECTWR LLC Since Condor owns of B Shares in WRB I would presume that WRB can go ahead and sell the shares subject to the right price as long as it gets Condors consent ie Condor will not be a signatory to the Purchase and Sale Agreement with NB WRB would also have to get consent from ENA who is the other owner of WRB LLC but that is no problem I attach the diagram I would appreciate your confirmation or lack of it of my understanding Thanks Ranabir

Put Option Value Payment to be made by Condor Cc As you can see from the table below I have also attached the worksheet the Adjusted Estimated Value is for both projects mm however the appraised value is mm When the Trust exercises the Put Option does PRCWRC or Condor have to give the Trust mm ie the appraised FMV or can we just give the Adjusted Estimated Value of mm and be done with it Can ENE pay the interest accrued on the Notes and Certificates or do they have to be paid by CondorPRCWRC With regards to the ongoing Equity Obligation can ENE take on that responsibility or does it have to be Condor Cris from an accounting perspective do you have any concern I would like ENE to pay the interest and the ongoing equity obligation if possible as it would reduce the interestexpenses that we have to pay to Condor However I do want to achieve the overall objectives which are keep the assets offbalance sheet not create a negative fundsflow and maintain flexibility from a FAS perspective in our sale to Northern Border Katie Could you find out the Ongoing Equity Obligations on ENEs portion for Powder which I presume is none but would like it reconfirmed and Wind Thanks Ranabir

Re Wind River Meeting Today Monday July Cc Please book the same room for the same time pm on July for a follow up meeting on Wind River The invitees will be Katie Stowers Joel Ephross Gerald Nemec Shonnie Daniel Audrey Pullen Dean Henry BR Ann Vaughn BR Sean Bunk AK Rob Taylor AK Also set up a conference call number as the folks from AK and BR will not be coming over to our office Thanks Ranabir Amy CT AM To Shonnie CT Katie CT Ranabir nron cc Subject Wind River Meeting Today Monday July The new location for the Wind River meeting today at pm is EB Sean and Rob Please go to the Security Desk at the Enron Building Smith and sign in Then go to the th floor and I will meet you and take you to the conference room Thank you Amy

Re Wind River Meeting Today Monday July Cc Please book the same room for the same time pm on July for a follow up meeting on Wind River The invitees will be Katie Stowers Joel Ephross Gerald Nemec Shonnie Daniel Audrey Pullen Dean Henry BR Ann Vaughn BR Sean Bunk AK Rob Taylor AK Also set up a conference call number as the folks from AK and BR will not be coming over to our office Thanks Ranabir Amy CT AM To Shonnie CT Katie CT Ranabir nron cc Subject Wind River Meeting Today Monday July The new location for the Wind River meeting today at pm is EB Sean and Rob Please go to the Security Desk at the Enron Building Smith and sign in Then go to the th floor and I will meet you and take you to the conference room Thank you Amy

Draft Confirmation for Lost CreekForwarded by Ranabir DuttCorpEnron on AM on AM To cc Subject Draft Confirmation for Lost Creek We have attached a draft confrim for the Lost Creek hedge Please confirm the trade details and in particular the amortization schedule If you have any questions or changes please let us know We look forward to speaking with you next week Scott Sample confirm Sept doc For more information about Barclays Capital please visit our web site at Internet communications are not secure and therefore the Barclays Group does not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message Any views or opinions presented are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent those of the Barclays Group unless otherwise specifically stated Sample confirm Sept doc

Re Draft Confirmation for Lost CreekSara CT on AM To Ranabir NRON cc Subject Re Draft Confirmation for Lost Creek Will the ISDA be negotiated prior to execution of your trade Yes Are the trade terms correct You did not send me a deal ticket Who is the trader Who will be responsible for payments under the swap ie will it be you The project company Lost Creek will be responsible for payments under the swap What happened to comments on the Schedule We spoke to Barclays about your comments and other comments from BR who is the admin partner for Lost Creek A revised version of the comments is due from Barclays I will send them to you once I get them Who is reviewing the Schedule from a credit perspective No one from Enron credit is reviewing it It does not seem that such a review is necessary give me a call and we can discuss We have negotiated a cross acceleration to the project debt rather than a cross default Could you please refax my comments to your Schedule I have misplaced my version Thanks Sara Yes Ranabir NRON AM To Pushkar CT Katie CT Sara CT Shonnie CT cc Subject Draft Confirmation for Lost Creek Forwarded by Ranabir DuttCorpEnron on AM on AM To cc Subject Draft Confirmation for Lost Creek We have attached a draft confrim for the Lost Creek hedge Please confirm the trade details and in particular the amortization schedule If you have any questions or changes please let us know We look forward to speaking with you next week Scott Sample confirm Sept doc For more information about Barclays Capital please visit our web site at Internet communications are not secure and therefore the Barclays Group does not accept legal responsibility for the contents of this message Any views or opinions presented are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent those of the Barclays Group unless otherwise specifically stated Sample confirm Sept doc

Wind River Swap AgreementSara We had some tax items outstanding which was of concern to Burlington owner of Lost Creek which has now got sorted out Attached is the marked up version of the ISDA schedule hopefully the final version If you have any comments on it please give me a call Thanks Ranabir Forwarded by Ranabir DuttCorpEnron on PM JASON PETERS on PM To cc Sean Bunk ROB TAYLOR Subject Wind River Swap Agreement Jay Mike and Pat Attached for your please find a blacklined copy of the abovereferenced Agreement marked to show changes to the previously distributed draft Please call me with any comments or questions Please note that this draft has not been reviewed by our client and remains subject to their review and approval in all respects Thanks Jason BlacklinDOC

Wind River Swap AgreementSara We had some tax items outstanding which was of concern to Burlington owner of Lost Creek which has now got sorted out Attached is the marked up version of the ISDA schedule hopefully the final version If you have any comments on it please give me a call Thanks Ranabir Forwarded by Ranabir DuttCorpEnron on PM JASON PETERS on PM To cc Sean Bunk ROB TAYLOR Subject Wind River Swap Agreement Jay Mike and Pat Attached for your please find a blacklined copy of the abovereferenced Agreement marked to show changes to the previously distributed draft Please call me with any comments or questions Please note that this draft has not been reviewed by our client and remains subject to their review and approval in all respects Thanks Jason BlacklinDOC
